destination.name: dempo park
destination.about: Dempo Park is a tourist attraction owned by the Pagaralam City Government. During the holiday season, this tourist spot is crowded with tourists, both from within and outside the city. Therefore, the Pagaralam City Government plans to develop this tourist attraction again.
